name: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Allan Christopher SMITH.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Allan Christopher SMITH.
casebody.head_matter:
In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Allan Christopher SMITH.
No. D-2978.
Supreme Court of the United States
June 12, 2017.
Allan Christopher Smith, of Morrisville, Pennsylvania, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
